I am sure there are collectors there. This being an English speaking 
forum=
 we get people who are comfortable with English and there are 
members from=
 the southern hemisphere. There would be more who do not 
speak English and=
 those not even aware of this forum. How many? Do 
not know. How much work =
would be available. How big of a group would 
need it? Surely not enough to=
 be a full time occupation. What is your 
name? Maybe some of us know of yo=
ur work in Nederland. John
